title: Plutus Integration with Pony Lang
description: Some Cardano-based projects could benefit from the use of an actor model language with similar guarantees as Haskell. Scalability by design.
solution: Pony is a performant actor model language with guarantees like Haskell, and memory safety like Rust. Integration for PABs and side-chains.
experience: I've spent 15+ years studying complex systems with a focus on how primitives in language design can simplify the process of building them.
